transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, Vinay baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Actually sir hamara discussion chal raha tha aapke renewal ko leke na.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Haan, ji toh wohi sir discuss karna tha aap keh rahe the aapko discuss karna hai aapke partners ke saath ek baar kya finalize kar rahe hai aap.
Customer: Abhi tak, abhi tak nahi hua.
Executive: Jaise ho jayega mai khud phone karunga aaj renewal karna hai karke.
Executive: Accha sir actually isme na matlab aapme ek requirement thi aapki ki aap isko agar hum log last price me karte hai toh we have managed that ki hum log last price me kar pa rahe hai but hamare paas thoda timeline hai update aa raha hai sir baar baar.
Customer: Next sir, hota hai tab tak, ye dekho sir, aapka ye bhi hota hai tab tak aapko ek fix karne ke liye kya usme karke tha. Nahi nahi sir hum toh chahte hai na matlab hum toh yahi chahte hai ki renewal ho jaye abhi kya hamara bhi, hamara bhi aisa hota hai iska hota hai iska thoda aisa bhi show matlab chalu hai. Jaise ho jayega, hota hai approval milta hai rate me baithta hai toh karenge nahi toh aapne dusra option hai aisa kuch nahi hai karenge apan, lekin karne wale hai aapke saath.
Customer: Aisa toh nahi hai ki hum continue nahi karne wale hai, karne wale hai lekin hame jab chahiye tab milta hai tab karenge toh thik hai, nahi milta hai toh dusra option dekh lenge.
Executive: Sir meri situation samajhne ki koshish kijiye mai chahta hu ki ho dono services aapki renew ho aur aap hi condition me hi ho. Mai har cheez compromise kar raha hu aap se bas ek request kar raha hu agar kyuki aap keh rahe hai aapko karna hai toh agar aap thoda sa agar ek baar discussion karke kar lenge toh sir bahut hi smooth cheeze ho jayengi mere ko bhi baar baar update milna padta hai.
Customer: Hoga, discussion bhi hoga, payment abhi hamara bahut strictly hai, 20 tarikh ko renewal hai toh uske ek, ek din pehle renewal payment ho jayega.
Executive: Sir 20 tarikh ko renewal toh hai lekin aapki jo requirement hai last paid price ki woh badi mushkil se manage kar paaye sir hum.
Customer: Isliye mai aapko nahi toh mere ko bhi, mere ko aapko renewal ke liye mana nahi kar rahe.
Customer: Tension mat dijiye, hota hai toh hum rate me nahi toh dusra package de denge aapko, itna mat tension lijiye aap.
Executive: Sir mai aapko bolunga 20 tarikh ko aapko ye service itne me nahi mil paegi toh mujhe bhi accha nahi lagega aur aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, woh toh woh toh, nahi hota hai toh aap second package dekh lenge. Dusra, dusra koi itna aapko hai nahi uske liye.
Executive: Dusra package me jo rate me baithega, haan baithega toh nahi toh apna dusra package hai aapke paas, dusra package apan aapke paas leke chalenge.
Customer: Aap, aap 20 tarikh ke liye flexible hai na ki agar price nahi ho paega toh koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Yes, yes, yes.
Executive: Thik hai sir koi problem nahi hai. Sir toh isme matlab yahi tha ek humko ye confirmation karna tha ki aisa na ho ki 20 ko hum discussion kare toh aisa rahe ki humne aapko inform nahi kiya.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, sir hota hai same package me karenge nahi hota hai toh dusra package kar lenge apna, isme itna kuch nahi hoga. Lekin to be honest, to be honest, aapke saath, sabke saath, aapke saath continue rehne hi wale hai, aap tension lena hota hai rate me toh same rate me same package me karenge nahi hota hai toh another package me aayenge.
Executive: Sir to be honest mai aapko sach batau mai jhoot nahi bol raha hu is cheez ke liye mere ko approval sirf 15 tak ka hai. Mai aapko isme 21 22 aise badha ke kam karke nahi bol raha hu. Hamare yaha pe mahine do FNTs me close hota hai ek 15 tak hoti hai ek 30 tak hoti hai toh mere ko first FNT ke liye approval mila tha on the basis of jo aapne feedback humko diya aur uske liye bhi mere ko kaafi bhag daud karni padi.
Customer: Ab agar aap bol rahe hai ki aap flexible hai aap nahi karenge matlab mai toh chahta hu aap kare.
Executive: Lekin sir ab mai abhi sir yaha pe kaam hi karta hu mere ko bhi approval apni hierarchy upar wali hierarchy se lena padta hai.
Customer: Management ka meeting hota hai toh parso aapka payment ho jayega, aisa hota hai hamara jab meeting hota hai sabo ke baad ho jata hai.
Executive: Sir expected time bata sakte hai kab tak matlab aapko toh pata hi rahega sir kab tak meeting ho sakti hai aap logo ki.
Customer: Maximum Saturday tak meeting possible hai hamara kal ya parso do din me.
Executive: Ye coming Saturday na.
Customer: Haan, haan. Haan toh matlab 15 ko aap keh rahe hai ki aapki meeting ho jayegi. By 15th aap mujhe conclude kar sakte hai agar aapki meeting ho jati hai. Mere ko conclude kar sakte hai sir mere paas bhi koi chance rahega mai yaha pe yahi mail bhi.
Customer: Immediate, immediate, immediate karunga, immediate karunga, immediate karunga.
Executive: Sir please mere paas mai aapko isliye maine honestly aapko transparent sab ye bataya ki mere paas 15 tak ka hai mai immediate jaise meeting ho jayega immediate aapko update kar dunga.
Executive: Sure sir, okay sir, thank you. Yahi janna tha sir bas mujhe aapse bhi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants renewal at the last paid price.

- Wants to know the timeline for the meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to try for last paid price.

- Executive informed about approval limit till 15th.

- Executive will update after the meeting.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, last price, meeting, timeline
